checklistItems.descEng: This set of tasks will guide you through completing a site survey.
checklistItems.descFra: (fr) This set of tasks will guide you through completing a site survey.

checklistItems.descEng: This set of tasks will guide you through writing standard operating procedures.
checklistItems.descFra: (fr) This set of tasks will guide you through writing standard operating procedures.

checklistItems.descEng: This guides you through researching your site ahead of time to ensure safety and legality.
checklistItems.descFra: (fr) This guides you through researching your site ahead of time to ensure safety and legality.

checklistItems.descEng: This guides you through the day-of, pre-flight requirements, like checking the weather.
checklistItems.descFra: (fr) This guides you through the day-of, pre-flight requirements, like checking the weather.

checklistItems.titleEng: Create a file where you keep all the details of your research and surveying.
checklistItems.titleFra: (fr) Create a file where you keep all the details of your research and surveying.

checklistItems.titleEng: Use Canadian airspace data to determine a location for your flight that is outside of airspace.
checklistItems.titleFra: (fr) Use Canadian airspace data to determine a location for your flight that is outside of airspace.

checklistItems.titleEng: There are two recommended tools for this CFS and RPAS Site Selection.
checklistItems.titleFra: (fr) There are two recommended tools for this CFS and RPAS Site Selection.
